author: bago
msg: Changed james m2 skin to use remote resources plugin (to include NOTICE/LICENSE in generated jar)

Updated parent to remove usage of "resources" link to NOTICE/LICENSE in favor of custom remote resource plugins to be added in child projects.
Updated the HOWTO to reflect the remote-resources needs.
